en.title: FE Welcomes QP Wearer, Mr. Alfredo Velayo, Co-Founder of Prominent Accounting Firm, SGV (SYCIP, GORRES & VELAYO). Mr Velayo is also the President of William J Shaw Foundation. Mr Velayo Is Seen Here with FE Leaders, Judge Lorenzo Veneracion and Pastor Ar
